page.title: 05RIVER WELLAND
page.content: The{River Welland}runs through Market Deeping and Deeping St James.Thousands of people fish on the river every year but there are other sports like raft-racing and boating.The river has a lot of wildlife like birds,otters, kingfishers and water rats.The river benefits the people of the Deepings area because they don't have to go far to go fishing.Deeping St.James Angling Club has been the sole owner of the river for 400 years. There is a bailiff who is responsible for the river from Spalding to the other side of Stamford,and who comes from the Anglian Water Authority.The people who live on the river bank have to cut it and keep it tidy and it makes a pleasant surrounding.There are two weirs on the river which help to control the flow of water.
